Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Nespaneferher, Overseer of the Army of the Estate of Amun with black detail: a striated lappet-wig tied with a fillet; crossed hands holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of Hieroglyphic text; the back bears a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
